sentences.en: ...thumbnail sketches of heads of state and political figures.
sentences.cn: …国家首脑和政治要员们的简要陈述。

sentences.en: a biographical sketch of the Prime Minister
sentences.cn: 首相生平简介

sentences.en: A sketch of his apparatus is shown in Figure 3 - 2 .
sentences.cn: 图 3-2 是他的实验仪器的简图.

sentences.en: Annie took out her drawing pad and pencil to dash off a sketch of the Indians.
sentences.cn: 安妮拿出画本和铅笔,迅速地画了一幅印第安人的素描.

sentences.en: At the meeting he gave a sketch of recent happenings.
sentences.cn: 会上他简述了最近发生的事件.

sentences.en: Clare and David Astor are sketching a view of far Spanish hills.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔和大卫·阿斯特正在素描远处西班牙山峦景色。

sentences.en: He fills in a sketch with shadow.
sentences.cn: 他在画稿上添衬上阴影.

sentences.en: He squiggled a sketch on the ground.
sentences.cn: 他在地上胡乱地画了个草图。

sentences.en: Holford sketched a 10-year programme for rebuilding the city.
sentences.cn: 霍尔福德简单介绍了城市重建的十年规划。

sentences.en: I always sketch with pen and paper.
sentences.cn: 我总是用钢笔和纸画素描。

sentences.en: I made the sketch ; he filled in the colours.
sentences.cn: 是我打的稿子, 他上的色.

sentences.en: I will send you a slight sketch of the house.
sentences.cn: 我将给你寄去房屋的草图.

sentences.en: It is impossible even to sketch the consequences of such choices.
sentences.cn: 这种不同选择的结果是无法预言的.

sentences.en: Make a rough sketch before you draw.
sentences.cn: 画画得先打个底子.

sentences.en: My sister often goes into the country to sketch.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐常到乡间去写生.

sentences.en: She quickly blocked out a sketch of the construction site.
sentences.cn: 她迅速画出一幅工地的草图.

sentences.en: So if we just sketch that.
sentences.cn: 那么如果我们把那画个草图。

sentences.en: The artist is making sketches for his next painting.
sentences.cn: 画家正为他的下一幅作品画素描。

sentences.en: The sketch should be a kind of rehearsal for the eventual painting.
sentences.cn: 草图应该是最终绘画的某种演练。

sentences.en: This sketch does not conform with the specifications.
sentences.cn: 图文不符.

sentences.en: Use different colours of felt pen on your sketch to avoid confusion.
sentences.cn: 用不同颜色的毡头笔画草图，以免搞混。

sentences.en: We now proceed to give a slight sketch of the Volsunga Saga.
sentences.cn: 下面我们来简略介绍一下《沃尔松格传说》.

words.tran_cn: 写生风格的；写生的；概略的
作素描者；舞台布景设计者

trans.tran_en: a simple, quickly made drawing that does not show much detail
to draw a sketch of something
